hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #a Green Rupee# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that there is an alcove with a Recovery Heart behind the lava wall in Dodongo's Cavern.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Song of Time# can be found at #Zora's River#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that obtaining the #underwater silver rupees in Gerudo Training Ground# rewards #a Green Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: Are you stuck? Try asking for help in our Discord server or check out our Wiki!

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #Wolfos# guarding a chest.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #10# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that in the #Sacred Forest Meadow#, Sheik teaches #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #Link's House#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a spider under a #crate in the crater# holds #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Lon Lon Ranch# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #the Fire Temple Boss Key# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to #the Key#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #the Zora Mask#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found at #Zora's River#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs #2 Deku Scrubs#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Thieves' Hideout#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: If Gorons eat rocks, does that mean I'm in danger?

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #0# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Forest Temple Boss Key# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Nocturne of Shadow# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #0# major items.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #1# major item.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that in a grotto with a #spider and a cow# you will find...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.
